rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0001
rows.name:
Man, the inside of this World Tree
is full of mysteries...

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0002
rows.name: Tora surprised too!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0003
rows.name:
I never imagined the World Tree
would look like this inside.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0004
rows.name:
Huh? I thought you were an expert
on this sort of stuff, Tora.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0005
rows.name:
No, there are plenty of things
Masterpon doesn't know.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0006
rows.name:
Especially common sense,
which is severely lacking...

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0007
rows.name:
Hey! Hana!
Stop dissing your Masterpon
like it's normal!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0008
rows.name:
Seriously,
it seems her personality
gets harsher in JD mode.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0009
rows.name: A troublesome one, mo...

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0010
rows.name:
Troublesome?
Didn't you make Hana yourself?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0011
rows.name:
That's true, but Hana is the
crystallization of three generations'
wisdom and technology.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0012
rows.name:
...Actually,
there are parts even
Tora doesn't understand.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0013
rows.name:
Hana's body contains
the work of Professor Senzo,
Professor Tatezo, and Masterpon...

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0014
rows.name:
The desires of three
men are packed inside.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0015
rows.name:
It would not be strange if
I start overflowing at any moment!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0016
rows.name:
Hana, that way of putting it is...
ethically really problematic,
you know...

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0017
rows.name: Anyway, Tora-

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0018
rows.name:
Could it be that you don't
fully understand all the
abilities of this JD mode?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0019
rows.name: That right.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0020
rows.name:
To begin with,
the foundation of the mode change
was built by Grandpa Senzo.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0021
rows.name:
So the core part of the system
is still a black box.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0022
rows.name: What should I ask?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0023
rows.name: Can't you figure it out through analysis?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0024
rows.name:
Does even Hana
not understand
her own abilities?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0101
rows.name:
That's not possible.
Even Dad couldn't figure
it out.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0102
rows.name:
Because on the box it says
"Do not open, mo!"...

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0103
rows.name: The...box?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0104
rows.name:
...No way, you mean the "black box"
is actually a real box!?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0105
rows.name: Want to see it?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0106
rows.name: So the box is inside Hana's body?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0107
rows.name:
Alright,
then let's open it
and take a look.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0108
rows.name:
Absolutely not!
That could trigger 
my self-destruct mechanism!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0109
rows.name: S-self-destruct?!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0110
rows.name:
Don't tell me
you actually have
that function?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0111
rows.name: Of course.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0112
rows.name:
Grandpa Senzo was a passionate man
who burned with romantic notions
about self-destruction.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0113
rows.name: So we can't let our guard down...

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0114
rows.name:
What a bothersome
idea to build into you...

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0115
rows.name: Anyway, Hana-

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0116
rows.name:
Doesn't it bother you
to have a bomb inside you?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0117
rows.name: Yes, not a problem at all!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0118
rows.name:
After all, I have things
far more dangerous
than bombs.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0121
rows.name: What's wrong, Mo-mo?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0122
rows.name: Zeke? Masterpon?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0123
rows.name:
Why are you moving away
from Hana?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0201
rows.name: ...Hana's abilities?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0202
rows.name:
That's right.
Isn't there still some
hidden ability in there?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0203
rows.name: Hmm...

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0204
rows.name: ...I found one!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0205
rows.name:
Oh, what is it?
What is it?
Show me.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0206
rows.name: Hana feels moe-moe for Zeke-wan!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0207
rows.name:
...Hey, hey, Zeke?
Can Hana be more spoiled
by you-wan?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0208
rows.name: What's going on?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0209
rows.name:
It's Hana's hidden ability,
the beast-attribute dog-ear mode.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0210
rows.name:
Hana! That mode is only supposed
to be used for me!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0211
rows.name:
I told you to keep that
sealed away forever because
it makes you look weird!!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0212
rows.name:
Yeah...That sounds like
one of your hobbies...

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0213
rows.name:
How honest are you
about your desires...?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0214
rows.name: This is so embarrasing...

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0215
rows.name:
Anyway, that's not
the kind of function
I was asking about.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0216
rows.name:
You don't have any hidden function
we could use for battle or exploring?
Something like that?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0217
rows.name:
Even if Tora doesn't know,
isn't there some ability that only Hana
can draw out from the black box?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0218
rows.name: Absolutely none.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0219
rows.name: Seriously?! Not a single one?!
